birth_place.zh-cn: 美国康涅狄格州纽黑文市

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾担任第43任美国总统。
description.en: American politician who served as the 43rd President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第41任美国总统，乔治·沃克·布什的父亲。
description.en: American politician, 41st President of the United States, and father of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国前第一夫人，乔治·赫伯特·沃克·布什的妻子，乔治·沃克·布什的母亲。
description.en: Former First Lady of the United States, wife of George H. W. Bush and mother of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国前第一夫人，乔治·沃克·布什的妻子。
description.en: Former First Lady of the United States, wife of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任佛罗里达州州长，乔治·沃克·布什的弟弟。
description.en: American politician, former Governor of Florida, and younger brother of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什总统任内担任副总统。
description.en: American politician who served as Vice President during the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第42任美国总统，乔治·沃克·布什的前任。
description.en: American politician, 42nd President of the United States, predecessor of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第44任美国总统，乔治·沃克·布什的继任者。
description.en: American politician, 44th President of the United States, successor to George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 前伊拉克总统，其政权在美国发动的伊拉克战争中被推翻。
description.en: Former President of Iraq, whose regime was overthrown in the U.S.-led Iraq War.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在2004年美国总统选举中作为民主党候选人与乔治·沃克·布什竞争。
description.en: American politician who ran as the Democratic candidate against George W. Bush in the 2004 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在2000年美国总统选举中作为民主党候选人与乔治·沃克·布什竞争。
description.en: American politician who ran as the Democratic candidate against George W. Bush in the 2000 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在2000年共和党总统初选中与乔治·沃克·布什竞争。
description.en: American politician who competed against George W. Bush in the 2000 Republican presidential primary.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什总统任内担任国防部长。
description.en: American politician who served as Secretary of Defense during the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什总统任内担任国务卿。
description.en: American politician who served as Secretary of State during the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什总统任内担任国务卿。
description.en: American politician who served as Secretary of State during the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在乔治·沃克·布什总统任内接替拉姆斯菲尔德担任国防部长。
description.en: American politician who succeeded Donald Rumsfeld as Secretary of Defense during the presidency of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CCP and President of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，前英国首相，在伊拉克战争等议题上与布什政府紧密合作。
description.en: British politician and former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom who worked closely with the Bush administration, particularly on the Iraq War.

description.zh-cn: 基地组织创始人，被美国政府认定为九一一袭击事件的主谋。
description.en: Founder of al-Qaeda, identified by the U.S. government as the mastermind behind the September 11 attacks.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首、政府首脑与三军统帅。
description.en: The head of state, head of government, and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 美国德克萨斯州的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the U.S. state of Texas.

location.zh-cn: 美国康涅狄格州纽黑文市

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学，常春藤盟校成员。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in the United States.

location.zh-cn: 美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学，常春藤盟校成员。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国两大主要政党之一，通常被认为是保守派政党。
description.en: One of the two major political parties in the United States, generally considered the conservative party.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗的伊斯兰原教旨主义运动和军事组织，在2001年被美国领导的联军推翻。
description.en: An Islamic fundamentalist movement and military organization in Afghanistan, overthrown by a U.S.-led coalition in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 一个由奥萨玛·本·拉登创立的伊斯兰军事组织，被美国认定为九一一袭击事件的策划者。
description.en: An Islamic military organization founded by Osama bin Laden, identified by the U.S. as the planner of the September 11 attacks.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A country in East Asia governed by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 负责监督成员经济体之间执行各项贸易协定的国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization that regulates and facilitates international trade.

description.zh-cn: 2001年9月11日发生在美国本土的一系列自杀式恐怖袭击事件，由基地组织策划。
description.en: A series of four coordinated suicide terrorist attacks by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda against the United States on September 11, 2001.

description.zh-cn: 由美国及其盟友为回应九一一袭击事件而发起的一场全球性军事、政治、法律和意识形态斗争。
description.en: A global military, political, legal, and ideological struggle launched by the United States and its allies in response to the September 11 attacks.

description.zh-cn: 美国及其盟友为推翻塔利班政权、铲除基地组织势力而在阿富汗发动的战争。
description.en: A war launched by the United States and its allies in Afghanistan to overthrow the Taliban regime and eliminate al-Qaeda forces.

description.zh-cn: 美国及其盟友以伊拉克拥有大规模杀伤性武器为由发动的军事行动，推翻了萨达姆政权。
description.en: A military operation launched by the United States and its allies, citing Iraq's possession of weapons of mass destruction, which overthrew the regime of Saddam Hussein.

location.zh-cn: 美国墨西哥湾沿岸地区

description.zh-cn: 2005年8月发生在美国墨西哥湾沿岸的一场破坏性极强的飓风，对新奥尔良市造成了严重破坏。
description.en: An extremely destructive hurricane in August 2005 that caused severe damage along the U.S. Gulf Coast, especially in the city of New Orleans.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什是第41任美国总统乔治·赫伯特·沃克·布什的儿子。
description.en: George W. Bush is the son of the 41st U.S. President, George H. W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什是芭芭拉·布什的儿子。
description.en: George W. Bush is the son of Barbara Bush.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于1977年11月5日与劳拉·威尔士结婚。
description.en: George W. Bush married Laura Welch on November 5, 1977.

description.zh-cn: 杰布·布什是乔治·沃克·布什的弟弟。
description.en: Jeb Bush is the younger brother of George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于1968年在耶鲁大学取得历史学学士学位。
description.en: George W. Bush received a Bachelor of Arts degree in history from Yale University in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于1975年获得哈佛大学工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: George W. Bush earned a Master of Business Administration degree from Harvard University in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什是美国共和党成员，并代表该党当选州长和总统。
description.en: George W. Bush is a member of the Republican Party and was elected Governor and President as its nominee.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于1995年至2000年间担任第46任德克萨斯州州长。
description.en: George W. Bush served as the 46th Governor of Texas from 1995 to 2000.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于2001年至2009年间担任第43任美国总统。
description.en: George W. Bush served as the 43rd President of the United States from 2001 to 2009.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什接替比尔·克林顿成为美国总统。
description.en: George W. Bush succeeded Bill Clinton as President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 巴拉克·奥巴马接替乔治·沃克·布什成为美国总统。
description.en: Barack Obama succeeded George W. Bush as President of the United States.

position.en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 迪克·切尼在乔治·沃克·布什的总统任期内担任副总统。
description.en: Dick Cheney served as Vice President during George W. Bush's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 九一一袭击事件是布什总统任内的转捩点，促使他发动了一连串反恐战争。
description.en: The September 11 attacks were a turning point in Bush's presidency, leading him to launch a series of campaigns in the War on Terror.

description.zh-cn: 在九一一袭击事件后，乔治·沃克·布什发动了一连串反恐战争。
description.en: Following the September 11 attacks, George W. Bush launched a series of campaigns in the War on Terror.

description.zh-cn: 作为反恐战争的一部分，乔治·沃克·布什于2001年10月发动了阿富汗战争。
description.en: As part of the War on Terror, George W. Bush launched the War in Afghanistan in October 2001.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗战争旨在推翻塔利班政权。
description.en: The War in Afghanistan was intended to overthrow the Taliban regime.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗战争旨在铲除基地组织势力。
description.en: The War in Afghanistan was intended to eliminate the presence of al-Qaeda.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于2003年3月发动了伊拉克战争。
description.en: George W. Bush launched the Iraq War in March 2003.

description.zh-cn: 伊拉克战争推翻了萨达姆·侯赛因的政权。
description.en: The Iraq War overthrew the regime of Saddam Hussein.

description.zh-cn: 2001年，乔治·沃克·布什主导帮助中国大陆进入世界贸易组织。
description.en: In 2001, George W. Bush led efforts to facilitate Mainland China's entry into the World Trade Organization.

description.zh-cn: 在2000年美国总统选举中，乔治·沃克·布什击败了民主党候选人艾尔·戈尔。
description.en: George W. Bush defeated Democratic candidate Al Gore in the 2000 United States presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 在2004年美国总统选举中，乔治·沃克·布什击败了民主党参选人约翰·克里，成功连任。
description.en: George W. Bush defeated Democratic candidate John Kerry in the 2004 United States presidential election to win re-election.

description.zh-cn: 布什政府在飓风卡特里娜救灾工作上的处置遭遇到众多批评，使其支持度下滑。
description.en: The Bush administration's handling of the Hurricane Katrina relief efforts faced widespread criticism, leading to a decline in his approval ratings.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳德·拉姆斯菲尔德在布什总统任内担任国防部长。
description.en: Donald Rumsfeld served as Secretary of Defense under President Bush.

description.zh-cn: 克林·鲍威尔在布什总统任内担任国务卿。
description.en: Colin Powell served as Secretary of State under President Bush.

description.zh-cn: 康多莉扎·赖斯在布什总统的第二任期内担任国务卿。
description.en: Condoleezza Rice served as Secretary of State during President Bush's second term.

description.zh-cn: 罗伯特·盖茨在布什总统任内接替拉姆斯菲尔德担任国防部长。
description.en: Robert Gates succeeded Donald Rumsfeld as Secretary of Defense under President Bush.

description.zh-cn: 2006年4月20日，布什总统与时任中国国家主席胡锦涛在白宫会面。
description.en: On April 20, 2006, President Bush met with then-Chinese President Hu Jintao at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 布什与时任英国首相托尼·布莱尔保持亲密的合作关系和感情。
description.en: Bush maintained a close cooperative and personal relationship with then-British Prime Minister Tony Blair.
